You are the UI Engineer on team easyrent-complete. Your task is to COMPLETE form validation and components.

WORKING DIRECTORY: /home/sandriaas/_PROJECTS/easyrent/_apps/x-dashboard-0

TASK: Complete form infrastructure
1. Complete apps/erp/src/components/forms/FormField.tsx - Standardized form components
2. Complete apps/erp/src/lib/form-utils.ts - TanStack Form + Zod integration
3. Complete apps/erp/src/lib/hooks/useAutosave.ts - Debounced save with retry

Create validation schemas in apps/erp/src/lib/schemas/:
- booking.schema.ts
- customer.schema.ts
- vehicle.schema.ts
- product.schema.ts
- incident.schema.ts

Wire forms into:
- BookingWizard component
- Entity edit dialogs
- Inline edit cells

Use context7 MCP to query TanStack Form and Zod documentation.
Use react-hook-form-zod patterns from the codebase.

DO NOT STOP until all forms have proper validation. Work autonomously.
